subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Despite being just 17 years old and standing 5 feet 6 inches, Melanie Oudin, not the stars she grew up watching, is the focus of her country’s most important tennis tournament.
snippet: Despite being just 17 years old and standing 5 feet 6 inches, Melanie Oudin, not the stars she grew up watching, is the focus of her country’s most important tennis tournament.
